message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties if you were to acquire this product. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects the value we place on your interest in our product. We believe this price offers a great opportunity for you to experience all that our product has to offer without compromising quality. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed.
Dear Alice, thank you for the offer and for presenting the product. I see the value in it, however, I have a slightly different budget in mind. Would you consider a price of $700,000?

Dear Bob, thank you for your response. I appreciate your interest in our product. While we understand your budget constraints, we must respectfully decline the counteroffer of $700,000. Our product is valued at $800,000, reflecting its high quality and unique features. However, I would like to propose an alternative that might better suit your needs. How about considering our product at $750,000? This still maintains a fair balance between our valuation and your budget. I look forward to your response.
